title: 后台弹出神秘6的信息
author: 哔哩咖啡猫
txt_content:
Thaumcraft loaded a new chunk [268011, -204873] in dimension 0 (overworld) while populating chunk [268012, -204873], causing cascading worldgen lag.
[19:29:56] [Server thread/WARN]: Please report this to the mod's issue tracker. This log can be disabled in the Forge config.
[19:29:56] [Server thread/WARN]: Thaumcraft loaded a new chunk [268012, -204874] in dimension 0 (overworld) while populating chunk [268012, -204873], causing cascading worldgen lag.
[19:29:56] [Server thread/WARN]: Please report this to the mod's issue tracker. This log can be disabled in the Forge config.
[19:30:06] [Server thread/WARN]: Thaumcraft loaded a new chunk [268016, -204876] in dimension 0 (overworld) while populating chunk [268017, -204875], causing cascading worldgen lag.
[19:30:06] [Server thread/WARN]: Please report this to the mod's issue tracker. This log can be disabled in the Forge config.
[19:31:02] [Server thread/WARN]: ysb moved too quickly! -19.967076243832707,2.0,-12.707013068255037
帮忙看一下会不会导致服务器延迟或者掉线，以及修复方法？
好像是随机插件随机玩家世界就会导致

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
参照这里 https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=797425

会的，会使服务器卡顿的。

你可以尝试更新 Thaumcraft ，或者预加载区块

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 哔哩咖啡猫
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-31 19:36
参照这里 https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=797425

会的，会使服务器卡顿的。
请问预加载区块怎么实现呢？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
哔哩咖啡猫 发表于 2020-1-31 22:43
请问预加载区块怎么实现呢？
安装这个插件 https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=608265

然后输入 /wb set <半径>         设置边界。

然后 /wb [世界名] fill 预加载
